amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on finding efficiencies within the working capital fund activities of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1796 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1796 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3912-3915; text: CR S3915) To express the sense of the Senate on finding efficiencies within the working capital fund activities of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1796 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1796 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 1463.
